description:
The Planet Crafter is a base building game on different planets where you have to terraform them
to survive their harsh environment and develop a new ecosystem on them.

v0.0.1-poc.description:
# Basic world implementation for The Planet Crafter Archipelago

- Randomize Blueprints, trades and the 11 tiers of microchip
- Regions implemented : Progress Blueprints, Trading Blueprints, the 11 Microchip Blueprints tiers
- Goal option for planet Prime (Sentinel, Smugglers, Wardens)
v0.0.1-poc.title: The Planet Crafter Archipelago world - v0.0.1 POC
